86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) judged that the unmarried person who was guilty of illegal sexual intercourse be exiled for one year and receive the legal punishment (i.e., be flogged with one-hundred stripes)

chapter.eng-name: Unmarried should be flogged and exiled
